name: Amazon Prime Student
fullDescription: Amazon Prime Student (now Prime for Young Adults) offers 50% off Prime membership for college students and young adults ages 18-24, with a 6-month free trial.
whatTheyOffer:
- 6-month free trial
- $7.49/month or $69/year (50% off regular Prime)
- All Prime benefits: free shipping, Prime Video, Prime Music
- 5% cash back on select categories (limited time)
- Eligible for up to 4 years
howToGetIt:
1. Visit amazon.com/Amazon-Student
2. Students: verify with .edu email or enrollment proof
3. Ages 18-24 (non-students): verify age with ID
4. Start 6-month free trial
5. After trial or 4 years, converts to regular Prime pricing
keywords: Amazon Prime, student discount, Prime Student, college, university, 50% off, free shipping, Prime Video, 18-24
